summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of CRM database management app. All major features tested successfully including authentication, file upload/download workflow, role-based access control, and UI functionality. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate, frontend UI is fully functional with proper error handling and role restrictions.
passed_tests: Admin login with correct credentials (admin@crm.com / admin123)
Staff login with correct credentials (staff@crm.com / staff123)
Invalid login properly shows error message
Admin dashboard loads with all navigation items (overview, upload, databases, requests, history, users)
Staff dashboard loads with limited navigation (databases, requests, history only)
Admin can upload CSV database files with description
Database listing and search functionality works
Database preview modal displays table data correctly
Staff can request download for databases
Admin can view and approve download requests
Staff can see approved requests with download buttons
Download history tracking works correctly
Admin can create new users with role selection
Role-based access control prevents staff from accessing admin features
Password visibility toggle works on login form
Logout functionality redirects to login page
All backend APIs return correct status codes and responses
File upload accepts CSV and Excel formats
Database search filters results correctly
Download request workflow (request → approve → download) functions end-to-end
User creation form validation and submission works
Error handling displays appropriate messages
All data-testid attributes present for automated testing
Professional UI design with proper spacing and typography
